imdb.plot outline: Aditya and Manav are a part of the Special Investigation Team headed by Commissioner Gogol Chaterjee. Aditya and Manav are diagonally opposite in there habits, behavior and line of thought. Though Commissioner Chaterjee is often irritated by Aditya and Manav's behavior but respects them for their amazing insight and observational abilities. Aditya is initially infuriated at the thought of working with Manav and goes to great lengths to keep him out of his way. However, the two soon become best friends. The overarching plot of the series focuses on the romance between Manav and his girlfriend Dolly and also Aditya and Aayesha. Dolly and Ayesha are sisters who live with their widowed Mother Neena, a social activist. Neena is always on a look out for companionship which creates a lot of problems and misunderstandings in Dolly and Ayesha's life.
imdb.title: Partners
plot: Inspector Manav Anang Desai, a happy go lucky, bumbling Police Officer, and Inspector Aditya by-the-book Police Officer, as they are forced into forming an unlikely partnership.

Aditya and Manav are a part of the Special Investigation Team headed by Commissioner Gogol Chaterjee. Aditya and Manav are diagonally opposite in there habits, behavior and line of thought. Though Commissioner Chaterjee is often irritated by Aditya and Manav's behavior but respects them for their amazing insight and observational abilities. Aditya is initially infuriated at the thought of working with Manav and goes to great lengths to keep him out of his way. However, the two soon become best friends. The overarching plot of the series focuses on the romance between Manav and his girlfriend Dolly and also Aditya and Aayesha. Dolly and Ayesha are sisters who live with their widowed Mother Neena, a social activist. Neena is always on a look out for companionship which creates a lot of problems and misunderstandings in Dolly and Ayesha's life.
